entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
